# ion-nav-set-root

`NavSetRoot` is an element that allows you to set the root of the current navigation stack.
It is the element form a calling `NavController.setRoot()`


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute   | Description                                              | Type             |
| ---------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- |
| `componentProps` | --          | Data you want to pass to the component as props          | `ComponentProps` |
| `component`      | `component` | Component you want to make root for the navigation stack | `NavComponent`   |
